name: Sofia's Memory Game
description:
Do you remember where it was? Turn the cards as little as possible to earn great score!

My 5 years old daughter wanted to paint some cards to put on a memory game so I made the game! This has only one gameplay for now but some interesting mechanics will be added to increase the fun.

It's perfect for little kids to exercise memory and coordination!

I've made an android version to take the game on the go without an internet connection

FREE! NO ADDS!
